info.name: Cristal
info.description: What's Cristal - A new xwiki.org project to provide a modern knowledge base front-end - A wiki UI to rule them all: Provide a UI that can be plugged onto various content backends (XWiki, local file system, GitHub, etc.) - Usable in various forms: - From a URL in your browser - Executable locally on your computer (Electron application). - Embeddable in backends. For example, the intent on the long run is to have Cristal be used by XWiki as its native UI - Ability to work offline, reconnect, and sync content.
info.author: Manuel Leduc
